for ventilation
3. Clear airway 
/circle6 Suction the mouth fi  rst and then the nose, using the mucus extractor/mechanical 
suction and tubing.
/circle6 If mechanical suction is used, gently introduce the suction tube 5 cm into the baby’s 
mouth, until the 5-cm mark is at the baby’s lips. 
/circle6 Use suction while withdrawing the tube.
/circle6 Next, introduce the suction tube 1–2 cm into each nostril. 
/circle6 Use suction while withdrawing the tube and until there is no mucus. 
4. Dry, stim
